Package card.energy.energycards

package card.energy.energycards
This package contains all the energy cards in the game. Energy cards are used to allow Pokémon to use their moves as well as to pay for retreat costs. Each energy card has a specific type and value associated with it, which determines its use in the game.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tyler Mong
